title: Gifting New Friends
body: when gifting friends you have just made do you have to wait for 2 weeks to gift them? or just a day

replies.body:
It used to be two weeks, but it was relaxed to a few days. Not sure on the specifics.

There are still some certain level-specific actions. [Here's the specifics.](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/store-update/were-relaxing-gifting-restrictions)
